Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Circle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle1, Circle2
    public abstract class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a base abstract class for a circle. Everything except a intersects() method is implemented here. Subclass must implement the intersects() method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Point center  
      protected double radius

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle​(double x,
              double y,
              double radius)
        Create new circle
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the center
        y - is the y coordinate of the center
        radius - is the radius (assume non-negative)

    • Method Detail

      • scale

        public double scale​(double factor)
        Change size of circle
        Parameters:
        factor - is the scaling factor (0.8 make it 80% as big, 2.0 doubles its size) (if negative, return without scaling)
        Returns:
        the new radius

      • moveBy

        public Point moveBy​(double xOffset,
                    double yOffset)
        Change position of circle relative to current position
        Parameters:
        xOffset - is amount to change x coordinate
        yOffset - is amount to change y coordinate
        Returns:
        the new center coordinate

      • intersects

        public abstract boolean intersects​(Circle other)
        Test if this circle intersects another circle.
        Parameters:
        other - is the other circle
        Returns:
        True if the circles' outer edges intersect at all, False otherwise
